reviewText: Ultimate Karate - full 8 DVD training set from white to black beltFrom what limited information I can glean from the author's bio, he has a Black belt in some style of Taikwondo. That is a Korean martial art and is not Karate. As for a Blackbelt in Nunchaku and American Bo - there is no such thing! These are Okinawan weapons not a system that merits a Blackbelt. I must agree with the other review. Sounds like a 'Mac Dojo' to me.
Also there is no such thing as American Bo or American Nunchaku. This is clearly a misrepresentation to make money. Do yourself a favor and seek authentic videos instead of mixed up misleading ones.
